# Issue Closing / Handoff Template

This comment is mandatory when closing an issue.
It is the durable handoff for future agents or engineers.

## Summary
<What was completed, in plain language>

## Changes
- <key change 1>
- <key change 2>

## How to Verify
- <command(s) to run>
- <expected result>

## Verification State
- Tests: <pass/not run + why>
- Manual: <what you actually ran>

## Artifacts
- Commits: <links>
- PRs: <links>
- Docs updated: <yes/no + links>

## Notes / Follow-ups
- <limitations, deferred work, risks>

## Next
- Next issue: #<issue-number>
- Follow-up issues created (if any): #<id>, #<id>
